tns:patch.author: nmandrescu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_amp_activity_expanded; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_amp_activity_expanded AS SELECT av.*, dg_editor.body as expanded_description FROM amp_activity_version av LEFT JOIN dg_editor on av.description=dg_editor.editor_key, amp_activity_group WHERE av.amp_activity_id = amp_activity_group.amp_activity_last_version_id AND (av.deleted IS NULL OR av.deleted = false);
